channel.title: Hiring [Dev Team] BIG PROJECT - Scrilla Online - Guns, Cars, Zombies, etc!
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
Recently I have decided to tackle a very big project which peaked my interest when I found a few concept pictures online of a game that was rapidly gaining popularity even before a release. Anyhow, I am searching for a team who can fulfill the following tasks:
What am I looking for? - Server Developer (General: Fixes, Networking, Content, etc..) - Client Developer (depends on what server this'll be planned out to be) - Custom maps (all towns remade), items, NPCs etc - new game engine if neccesary - integrate custom music system - Website integration (webclient, highscores, etc)
I understand this will be quite an expensive project to complete which is why I hope we can develop something for the rsps fanbase who would like a new twist on things.
To see what we are aiming towards with this project please visit:
http://imgur.com/gallery/dDYYr
Feel free to add me on skype: talythan15
Please follow the format below and apply!
Skype: Dedication: Previous Work: Longterm (Y/N): Misc info:

@furyking50 wrote:

I used too be register to the ghetto online forums until i forgot my login to the forums, although it became locked so i never heard about the server again… since they never posted updates.

Read full topic

item.description:
@talythan wrote:

Hey Everyone,

Recently I have decided to tackle a very big project which peaked my interest when I found a few concept pictures online of a game that was rapidly gaining popularity even before a release. Anyhow, I am searching for a team who can fulfill the following tasks:

What am I looking for?

  • Server Developer (General: Fixes, Networking, Content, etc…)
  • Client Developer (depends on what server this’ll be planned out to be)
  • Custom maps (all towns remade), items, NPCs etc
  • new game engine if neccesary
  • integrate custom music system
  • Website integration (webclient, highscores, etc)

I understand this will be quite an expensive project to complete which is why I hope we can develop something for the rsps fanbase who would like a new twist on things.

To see what we are aiming towards with this project please visit:

[Album] Someone on 4chan took an old client of runescape and modded it into a GTA style game

Feel free to add me on skype: talythan15
